name: mysensors-adapter
description: MySensors add-on for Mozilla WebThings Gateway
author: CreateCandle

Gateway.description: How are you talking to the MySensors network? Via a USB device is most common.

USB device name.description: If you are using a USB connected gateway, what is the technical name of the USB device? You can try '/dev/ttyUSB0' or '/dev/ttyACM0'.

IP address.description: If you are using an ethernet gateway, what is its IP address? You can try '127.0.0.1' if it's installed on the same computer as the Mozilla WebThings gateway.

Show connection status.description: Enabling this will only show your node as connected once an actual sign of life has been received from the device.

Debugging.description: If you are having issues with the add-on, enabling this will result in a lot more debug data in the WebThings' internal log (which can be found under settings -> development).
